disease: Malignant neoplasm of mediastinum, part unspecified

symptoms.name: General unwellness
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild weakness to severe illness depending on cancer progression and size

symptoms.name: No symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Possible in early stages or slow-growing cancers

symptoms.name: Pressure on organs
symptoms.pattern: If the cancer is large, it can press on organs like the esophagus, trachea, or heart, leading to related symptoms

required: Uncontrolled cell multiplication in the mediastinal tissue
